ActControlled Drugs and Substances Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Narcotic Control Regulations (Synthetic Opioids)
PrecisOrder Amending the NARCOTIC CONTROL REGULATIONS (SYNTHETIC OPIOIDS) in order to add AP-237 and its salts, derivatives and analogues, and salts of derivatives and analogues to the Schedule of the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0099 Publication Date: 2024-06-05
